attributes.action: honour the Chuckle Brothers, Paul and Barry Elliot, with MBEs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For their outstanding contribution to children's entertainment over the last 25 years, Paul and Barry Elliot should be awarded MBEs.  They have consistently produced high quality comedy which has kept generations laughing year upon year through both their television and theatre work.  The Chuckle Brothers have set a gold standard for children's entertainment which others aspire to.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
